languages.text: {n}Идира резко подается вперед. На ее лице читается одновременно гнев и безысходность.{/n} "Ну уж нет, ксенос! Эта штука... этот пси-удушитель спасет мне жизнь! Ты... ты просто слабак и не можешь с ним совладать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира резко подается вперед. На ее лице читается одновременно гнев и безысходность.{/n} "Ну уж нет, ксенос! Эта штука... этот пси-дампер спасет мне жизнь! Ты... ты просто слабак и не можешь с ним совладать".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира резко подается вперед. На ее лице читается одновременно гнев и безысходность.{/n} "Ну уж нет, ксенос! Эта штука... этот пси-удушитель спасет мне жизнь! Ты... ты просто слабак и не можешь с ним совладать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just a weakling, that's why you can't handle it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然向前靠了过去，她的脸上写满了愤怒和绝望。{/n}“你想都别想，异形！那个东西……那个灵能抑制器可以救我的命！你……你的力量太弱小了，所以你才驾驭不了它！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然向前靠了过去，她的脸上写满了愤怒和绝望。{/n}“你想都别想，异形！那个东西……那个灵能抑制器可以救我的命！你……你的力量太弱小了，所以你才驾驭不了它！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}De repente, Idira se inclina hacia delante. La ira y la desesperación son evidentes en su rostro.{/n} «¡Ni en broma, xenos! ¡Esa cosa, ese... supresor psíquico va a salvarme la vida! Lo que pasa... ¡es que eres débil, y por eso no puedes soportarlo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, Idira se inclina hacia delante. La ira y la desesperación son evidentes en su rostro.{/n} «¡Ni en broma, xenos! ¡Esa cosa, ese... supresor psíquico va a salvarme la vida! Lo que pasa... ¡es que eres débil, y por eso no puedes soportarlo!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira lehnt sich plötzlich vor. Wut und Verzweiflung stehen ihr ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Keine Chance, Xenos! Dieses Ding, dieser ... Psi-Drossler wird mir das Leben retten! Ihr ... ihr seid nur schwach, deswegen kommt Ihr nicht damit zurecht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lehnt sich plötzlich vor. Wut und Verzweiflung stehen ihr ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Keine Chance, Xenos! Dieses Ding, dieser ... Psi-Drossler wird mir das Leben retten! Ihr ... ihr seid nur schwach, deswegen kommt Ihr nicht damit zurecht!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラが突然身を乗り出した。その顔は怒りと絶望に満ちている。{/n}「冗談じゃないわよ、ゼノ！それは…そのサイ・スティフラーは私の命を救ってくれるものなのよ！あなたは…ただ弱いだけ。だから扱えないのよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが突然身を乗り出した。その顔は怒りと絶望に満ちている。{/n}「冗談じゃないわよ、ゼノ！それは…そのサイ・スティフラーは私の命を救ってくれるものなのよ！あなたは…ただ弱いだけ。だから扱えないのよ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se penche soudainement, le visage distordu par la colère et le désespoir.{/n} « Il n'en est pas question, xénos ! Cette chose, ce... carcan psychique me sauvera la vie ! Vous... vous êtes juste faible. Voilà pourquoi vous ne pouvez le supporter ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se penche soudainement, le visage distordu par la colère et le désespoir.{/n} « Il n'en est pas question, xénos ! Cette chose, ce... carcan psychique me sauvera la vie ! Vous... vous êtes juste faible. Voilà pourquoi vous ne pouvez le supporter ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, aniden öne eğiliyor. Öfkesi ve çaresizliği, yüzünden okunuyor.{/n} "Mümkün değil zeno! O şey... O ruhboğan, benim hayatımı kurtaracak! Sen zayıf olduğundan ona katlanamıyorsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly leans forward. Anger and desperation are written all over her face.{/n} "Not a chance, xenos! That thing, that... psy-stifler, it will save my life! You... you're just weak, that's why you can't handle it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira aniden öne eğiliyor. Öfkesi ve çaresizliği yüzünden okunuyor.{/n} "Mümkün değil zeno! O şey... O ruhboğan benim hayatımı kurtaracak! Sen zayıf olduğun için ona katlanamıyorsun!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
